mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(reviewUid, rMemId, rMovieName, reviewContent, reviewGrade) VALUES(REVIEW_SEQ.nextval, #{rMemId}, #{rMovieName}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewGrade})
mapper.select: SELECT reviewUid, rMemId, rMovieName, reviewContent, reviewGrade, reviewHeart, reviewRegdate FROM ( SELECT reviewUid, rMemId, rMovieName, reviewContent, reviewGrade, reviewHeart, reviewRegdate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY reviewUid DESC) AS RNUM FROM REVIEW WHERE 1=1 reviewUid ) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY reviewUid DESC
SELECT COUNT(reviewUid) FROM REVIEW WHERE 1=1 AND reviewUid > 0
